api_list.name: getQueueStatus
api_list.description: Get current device queue stats.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wassenger.p.rapidapi.com/devices/{deviceId}/queue"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wassenger.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: syncDevice
api_list.description:
Force device status synchronization.

Only one device synchronization allowed every 60 seconds.
api_list.code:

url = "https://wassenger.p.rapidapi.com/devices/{deviceId}/sync"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wassenger.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: searchFiles
api_list.description: List files, optionally using multiple search filters.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Filter files by format type. If not present, files with any format will be returned

optional_parameters.name: ids
optional_parameters.description: Filter files by IDs

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: Deliver at after the given date

optional_parameters.name: sha2
optional_parameters.description: Find a file by its SHA2 checksum value

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search files by filename, tags or reference

optional_parameters.name: before
optional_parameters.description: Deliver at before the given date

expiresAt.description: File expiration date. The file will be no longer available once expired. You can also define a longer expiration date or re-upload the file.

filename.description: File name defined by the user or inferred

format.description: Media native presentation format allowed by WhatsApp. Defaults to native media format (audio, video or document). If you want to send videos as gifs, use format = "gif".  If you want to send audio messages like they were sent as voice records as PTT or Push To Talk, then use format = "ptt".

message.description: File optional message to be used as message caption when delivery

codec.description: Media format codec name, when available in video and audio files

duration.description: Media duration in seconds, when available in video and audio files

height.description: Media height size, when available in images and video files

width.description: Media width size, when available in images and video files

mime.description: File MIME type inferred at upload time

height.description: Media height size, when available in images and video files

image.description: Media preview image content in Base64 encoding, when available in images and video files

size.description: Media preview image file size in bytes

width.description: Media width size, when available in images and video files

reference.description: User defined file reference value for custom traceability

deliveries.description: Total number of file delivery attempts by sending it as attached media

downloads.description: Total number of file downloads via message delivery or API download requests

url.description: File origin remote URL, if provided

user.description: User owner ID of the file

url = "https://wassenger.p.rapidapi.com/io/{deviceId}/contacts/{contactWid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

url = "https://wassenger.p.rapidapi.com/io/{deviceId}/contacts/{contactWid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wassenger.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

broadcastId.description: Broadcast list WhatsApp ID without suffix, if contact type is broadcast

countryCode.description: Country code prefix of the phone number, if contact type is user and it has a phone number

displayName.description: Contact display name in WhatsApp profile

formattedName.description: Contact formatted full name provided by WhatsApp

formattedShortName.description: Contact formatted short name provided by WhatsApp

groupId.description: Group WhatsApp ID without suffix, if contact type is a group

url.description: Contact profile image URL provided by WhatsApp.

kind.description: Country code phone number prefix, if contact type is user

phone.description: International phone number, if contact type is user

shortName.description: Contact short name provided by WhatsApp

messages.description: Total processed messages by the contact. Stats might not be accurate or up to date.

syncedAt.description: Contact last syncronization date in ISO 8601 format

api_list.name: searchMessages
api_list.description: Search messages, optionally filtered by search params.

optional_parameters.name: waIds
optional_parameters.description: Search messages by WhatsApp ID. Multiple IDs allowed separated by comma.

optional_parameters.name: before
optional_parameters.description: Deliver at before the given date

optional_parameters.name: device
optional_parameters.description: Search messages by origin device ID or device phone number

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search messages by target phone, group, broadcast or message ID

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: Deliver at after the given date

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Results page size

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Results page number (starting from 0)

device.description: Device to which the current message is associated with

googleAccount.description: Google account associated with the message, in case it contains media files such as image or document

file.description: File media object. Seexx Files entity API endpoints for more information about files.

filename.description: Optional media file name, if available.

format.description: Media native presentation format allowed by WhatsApp. Defaults to native media format (audio, video or document). If you want to send videos as gifs, use format = "gif" (only compatible with "video/mp4" file type).  If you want to send audio messages like they were sent as voice records as PTT or Push To Talk, then use format = "ptt" (only compatible with "audio/ogg" file type).

phone.description: Target message mobile phone number in international format

reference.description: User defined message reference text-free value

sendReadAck.description:
Report unread chat messages after message delivery, simulating native user behavior.

Use "true" in order to report to the target user/group members that received messages were readed by you with blue double-check.

Note: in case you have disabled read confirmation in WhatsApp Settings > Account > Privacy, this configuration will have no effect.

api_list.name: searchDevices
api_list.description: List user devices, optionally filtered by search params.

concurrency.description: Messages delivery speed concurrency. Defaults to subscription plan default concurrency.

deliverySpeed.description: Maximum messages delivery speed per minute for the current device. Maximum plan delivery speed limit applies here. Use "0" for default plan delivery speed or define a custom allowed value for custom delivery speed control.

isNewNumber.description: If the number was created as a new number, this field will be "true".

newNumberEndsAt.description: If the number was created as a new number, this field stores the date limit where the new number anti-abuse policy applies, tipically up to 1 month.

rebootPolicy.description: Optionally enable automatic session reboot policy for the current device in a specific interval. This might help you to avoid performance or memory issues in long running sessions, which is especially helpful in I/O devices where the session is tipically running for long hours or days. The system will automatically reboot your device session without having to re-authorize it every time or requiring any manual intervention. Reboot will cause up to 2 minutes downtime and message processing delay, but no messages will be lost during the process.

retentionPolicy.description: Data retention policy applied to device's storage in the system, including inbound/outbound messages, chats, contacts and files. A custom data retention policy can be used to automatically delete messages once they are processed or after a specific amount ot time (e.g: 1 hour or 1 day). Once the maximum retention is exceede, message data will not be accessible from the Web Console or API anymore. If you take want to keep track of data, we recommend you to query the messages via API and store them in your own system.

api_list.name: getDeviceInvoices
api_list.description:
Get device invoices of current and past billing periods.

Invoices can also be viewed as HTML and PDF.

api_list.name: deviceHealth
api_list.description:
Get current device health status.

Possible status are:

- **new** - Device was recently created and not authorized yet.

- **error** - Device failed multiple times and is not currently available.

- **loading** - Device session is loading and not ready yet.

- **authorize** - Device session needs authorization via QR code.

- **authorizing** - Device session is authorizing.

- **offline** - Device is offline and cannot be reached via network. This is typically an operational issue.

- **online** - Device is online and authorized.

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: scanQR
api_list.description:
Get scan QR image to create session

If the device is already authenticated, it would return an error unless you pass the query param `force=true`.



**Note**: this endpoint might sometimes return an error the first time the QR code is requested. Simply retry the request until you get a valid response status.

optional_parameters.description: Return oldest messages starting from the given message ID

optional_parameters.name: before
optional_parameters.description: Messages created before the given date

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Filter messages by chat type

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Return messages sent from a given phone number or WhatsApp WID

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Results page size

optional_parameters.name: flow
optional_parameters.description: Filter by inbound or outbound messages

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Results page number (starting from 0)

optional_parameters.name: begin
optional_parameters.description: Return newest messages starting from the given message ID

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Return messages received to the given phone number or WhatsApp WID

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: Messages created after the given date

optional_parameters.name: chat
optional_parameters.description: Filter messages by chat ID

author.description: Optional group message author, if message chat is a group or broadcast type chat
